comments:
Build: I20061121-1845

1) In resource perspective
2) Opened new Folder wizard
3) Created a linked folder
4) Immediately after clicking finish the following error occurred. I think maybe it was trying to run decoration in the tree that appears in the new folder wizard, but failed because the dialog closed while it was running.

You can also get this by resetting the Java perspective
D-oh.  We forgot to add a method ViewerColumn.dispose() which removes its label provider listener from the label provider.

So yes, we have a problem in ViewerColumn, but the bug is just in HEAD, not in any of the I-builds yet.  This also means it is unrelated to what John saw.  I filed bug 166236 for the bug in ViewerColumn, which is probably what Tod saw.
I just realized the error occurred for me while running in a test workspace, against latest platform UI from HEAD.

Great - one mysterious bug less to worry about. :)

Bug 166236 contains a description of what needs to be done, so I'm marking this one as a duplicate of the newer one.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 166236 ***
